SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDERS WHERE S_ID=#{sId}
AND TO_CHAR(O_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}'
AND TO_CHAR(O_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP-1,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYY/MM/DD')
AND DELIVERY_STATUS != 'C4'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDERS WHERE DELIVERY_STATUS = 'C0'

SELECT DNUM.OP_DNUM "O_DNUM" , O.O_NUM , ORD.M_NUM , M.M_NAME , ORD.OP_DNUM , ORD.O_QTY , ORD.RECIPENO , RE.OP_NAME FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDER_DETAILS ORD ON O.O_NUM = ORD.O_NUM JOIN RECIPE RE ON ORD.RECIPENO = RE.RECIPENO JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT O_NUM , M_NUM , CASE WHEN O_DNUM = OP_DNUM THEN OP_DNUM ELSE OP_DNUM END "OP_DNUM" FROM ORDER_DETAILS ) DNUM ON DNUM.M_NUM = ORD.M_NUM AND DNUM.O_NUM = ORD.O_NUM AND DNUM.OP_DNUM = ORD.OP_DNUM JOIN MENU M ON ORD.M_NUM = M.M_NUM WHERE O.S_ID=#{sId} AND ORD.O_NUM = #{oNum} AND ORD.CA_NUM IN ('CAOP','CAIC','CAHT') ORDER BY DNUM.OP_DNUM,RE.OP_NAME
SELECT O_NUM FROM ORDERS WHERE TAKE_TIME IS NOT NULL AND DELIVERY_STATUS = 'C1' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI') > TO_CHAR(DE_APPLY_TIME+(TAKE_TIME/24/60),'HH24:MI')
